name: Light weight nodemailer server
description: A barebones Node.js app using Express 4 and nodemailer to send some emails for ya

GMAIL_USER.description: The gmail user name you want to send email from

GMAIL_PASS.description: Password of the gmail user you are sending emails from

HEROKU_URL.description: Url of your heroku instance so you can ping it!

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS SES Acceess Key Id. Needed for sending mail through the AWS SES transporter. Also requires AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY to be set

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS SES Secret Access Key. Needed for sending mail through the AWS SES transporter. Also requires AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID to be set

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: SendGrid API Key. Required to send mail w/ the SendGrid transporter
